scripts.gen: npm init -w app/$npm_config_name -y && cp -r template/. app/$npm_config_name && npm set-script -w app/$npm_config_name build "bin/build && cp src/appsscript.json dist/appsscript.json" && npm set-script -w app/$npm_config_name lint "prettier 'src/**/*.ts' && eslint 'src/**/*.ts'" && npm set-script -w app/$npm_config_name lint:fix "prettier --write 'src/**/*.ts' && eslint --fix 'src/**/*.ts'" && npm set-script -w app/$npm_config_name test "jest"
